title: "Stilers QB Ben Roethlisberger loses multiple fingers on July 4th fireworks incident?"
subtitle: It is reported that Dahir Pittsburgh, the quarter Ben Rutlesburger, lost several fingers in a fireworks accident on July 4th, is false news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Pittsburgh Stillers, quarterback Ben Rothlesburger, lost several fingers in a fireworks accident on July 4, 2017.
